Card.Name: Cellar
Card.Rules: +1 Action, Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.

Card.Name: Chapel
Card.Rules: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

Card.Name: Moat
Card.Rules: +2 Cards, When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

Card.Name: Chancellor
Card.Rules: +2 Coins, You may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

Card.Name: Village
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions.

Card.Name: Woodcutter
Card.Rules: +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

Card.Name: Workshop
Card.Rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

Card.Name: Bureaucrat
Card.Rules: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

Card.Name: Feast
Card.Rules: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

Card.Name: Gardens
Card.Rules: Variable, Worth 1 Victory for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

Card.Name: Militia
Card.Rules: +2 Coins, Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

Card.Name: Moneylender
Card.Rules: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins.

Card.Name: Remodel
Card.Rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

Card.Name: Smithy
Card.Rules: +3 Cards.

Card.Name: Spy
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your chouce.

Card.Name: Thief
Card.Rules: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck. If they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Throne Room
Card.Rules: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.

Card.Name: Council Room
Card.Rules: +4 Cards, +1 Buy, Each other player draws a card.

Card.Name: Festival
Card.Rules: +2 Actions, +1 Buy, +2 Coins.

Card.Name: Laboratory
Card.Rules: +2 Cards, +1 Action.

Card.Name: Library
Card.Rules: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

Card.Name: Market
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin.

Card.Name: Mine
Card.Rules: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more; put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Witch
Card.Rules: +2 Cards, Each other player gains a Curse card.

Card.Name: Adventurer
Card.Rules: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards in your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Courtyard
Card.Rules: +3 Card, Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Pawn
Card.Rules: Choose two: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, +1 Coin. (The choices must be different.).

Card.Name: Secret Chamber
Card.Rules: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. - When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Great Hall
Card.Rules: 1 Victory, +1 Card, +1 Action.

Card.Name: Masquerade
Card.Rules: +2 Card, Each player passes a card in their hand to the player on their left. You may trash a card from your hand.

Card.Name: Shanty Town
Card.Rules: +2 Actions, Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

Card.Name: Steward
Card.Rules: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

Card.Name: Swindler
Card.Rules: +2 Coins, Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

Card.Name: Wishing Well
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.

Card.Name: Baron
Card.Rules: +1 Buy, You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

Card.Name: Bridge
Card.Rules: +1 Buy, +1 Coin. All cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0 Coins.

Card.Name: Conspirator
Card.Rules: +2 Coins. If you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card, +1 Action.

Card.Name: Coppersmith
Card.Rules: Copper produces an extra 1 Coin this turn.

Card.Name: Ironworks
Card.Rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. If it is an... Action card, +1 Action. Treasure card, +1 Coin. Victory card, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Mining Village
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions. You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins.

Card.Name: Scout
Card.Rules: +1 Action. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

Card.Name: Duke
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Victory per Duchy you have.

Card.Name: Minion
Card.Rules: +1 Action, Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

Card.Name: Saboteur
Card.Rules: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 Coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Torturer
Card.Rules: +3 Card, Each other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

Card.Name: Trading Post
Card.Rules: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Tribute
Card.Rules: The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck. For each differently named card revealed, if it is an... Action Card, +2 Actions; Treasure Card, +2 Coins; Victory Card, +2 Cards.

Card.Name: Upgrade
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

Card.Name: Harem
Card.Rules: 2 Coins, 2 Victory.

Card.Name: Nobles
Card.Rules: 2 Victory, Choose one: +3 Cards, or +2 Actions.

Card.Name: Embargo
Card.Rules: +2 Coins, Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. - When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

Card.Name: Haven
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Lighthouse
Card.Rules: +1 Action, Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Coin. - While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.

Card.Name: Native Village
Card.Rules: +2 Actions, Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand. You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.

Card.Name: Pearl Diver
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

Card.Name: Ambassador
Card.Rules: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

Card.Name: Fishing Village
Card.Rules: +2 Actions, +1 Coin, At the start of your next turn: +1 Action, +1 Coin.

Card.Name: Lookout
Card.Rules: +1 Action, Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Smugglers
Card.Rules: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

Card.Name: Warehouse
Card.Rules: +3 Card, +1 Action, Discard 3 cards.

Card.Name: Caravan
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +1 Action\nAt the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Cutpurse
Card.Rules: +2 Coins, Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

Card.Name: Island
Card.Rules: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.\n---\n2 VP

Card.Name: Navigator
Card.Rules: +2 Coins, Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

Card.Name: Pirate Ship
Card.Rules: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

Card.Name: Salvager
Card.Rules: +1 Buy, Trash a card from your hand. +Coins equal to its cost.

Card.Name: Sea Hag
Card.Rules: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

Card.Name: Treasure Map
Card.Rules: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Bazaar
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +2 Actions, +1 Coin.

Card.Name: Explorer
Card.Rules: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

Card.Name: Ghost Ship
Card.Rules: +2 Card, Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

Card.Name: Merchant Ship
Card.Rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.

Card.Name: Tactician
Card.Rules: Discard your hand. If you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.

Card.Name: Treasury
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Coin, When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Wharf
Card.Rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, +1 Buy.

Card.Name: Transmute
Card.Rules:
Trash a card from your hand.
If it is an?
Action card, Gain a Duchy
Treasure card, gain a Transmute
Victory card, gain a Gold

Card.Name: Vineyard
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

Card.Name: Apothecary
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +1 Action\nReveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top in any order.

Card.Name: Herbalist
Card.Rules: +1 Buy\n+1 Coin\nWhen you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Scrying Pool
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nEach player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn't an Action.\nPut all of your revealed cards into your hand.

Card.Name: University
Card.Rules: +2 Actions\nYou may gain an Action card costing up to 5 Coins.

Card.Name: Alchemist
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\n+1 Action\nWhen you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.

Card.Name: Familiar
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nEach other player gains a curse.

Card.Name: Philosopher's Stone
Card.Rules: When you play this, count your deck and discard pile.\nWorth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

Card.Name: Golem
Card.Rules: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards.\nDiscard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

Card.Name: Potion
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Potion.

Card.Name: Apprentice
Card.Rules:
+1 Action
Trash a card from your hand.
+1 Card per Coin it costs.
+2 Cards if it has Potion in its cost.

Card.Name: Possession
Card.Rules: The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him.\nAny cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.

Card.Name: Loan
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Coin.\nWhen you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

Card.Name: Trade Route
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
+$1 per token on the Trade Route mat.
Trash a card from your hand.
---
Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

Card.Name: Watchtower
Card.Rules: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.\n----------\nWhen you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Bishop
Card.Rules:
1
+1 {VP}
Trash a card from your hand. +{VP} equal to half its cost in coins, rounded down.
Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

Card.Name: Quarry
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Coin.\n----------\nWhile this is in play, Action cards cost $2 less, but not less than $0.

Card.Name: Talisman
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Coin.\n----------\nWhile this is in play, when you buy a card costing $4 or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

Card.Name: Worker's Village
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\n+1 Buy

Card.Name: City
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\nIf there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +$1 and +1 Buy.

Card.Name: Contraband
Card.Rules: Worth 3 Coins.\n+1 Buy\nWhen you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.

Card.Name: Counting House
Card.Rules: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

Card.Name: Mint
Card.Rules: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.\n----------\nWhen you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

Card.Name: Mountebank
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nEach other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

Card.Name: Rabble
Card.Rules: +3 Cards\nEach other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

Card.Name: Royal Seal
Card.Rules: Worth 2 Coins.\n----------\nWhile this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Vault
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\nDiscard any number of cards. +$1 per card discarded.\nEach other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

Card.Name: Venture
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Coin.\nWhen you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

Card.Name: Goons
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
+$2
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
---
While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 {VP}.

Card.Name: Grand Market
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+$2
----------
You can't buy this if you have any Copper in play.

Card.Name: Hoard
Card.Rules: Worth 2 Coins.\n----------\nWhile this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

Card.Name: Bank
Card.Rules: Worth ? Coins.\nWhen you play this, it`s worth $1 per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

Card.Name: Expand
Card.Rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $3 more than the trashed card.

Card.Name: Forge
Card.Rules: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.

Card.Name: King's Court
Card.Rules: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

Card.Name: Peddler
Card.Rules: +1 Card; +1 Action; +2 Coin\n----------\nDuring your Buy phase, this costs $2 less per Action card you have in play, but not less than $0.

Card.Name: Platinum
Card.Rules: 5 Coins.

Card.Name: Black Market
Card.Rules: +2 Coins, Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. You may buy one of them immediately. Put the unbought cards on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order.\n(Before the game, make a Black Market deck out of one copy of each Kingdom card not in the supply.).

Card.Name: Envoy
Card.Rules: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one for you to discard. Draw the rest.

Card.Name: Stash
Card.Rules: Worth 2 Coins. When you shuffle, you may put this anywhere in your deck.
